tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Karthik Anand is a Doctor of excellence in his field of medicine. He has pleasing manner, listens to the problems with extreme attention and care. Diagnosis is accurate and explains the remedy procedure with clarity. He is easily accessable for clarifications and quite sensitively approaches the patients allaying their fear and insecurity. He prescribes optimal medication & physiotherapy only. Shows a good respect to his senior Doctor and also elders in general. I would recommend Dr Karthik Anand without a hesitation to any needy patient. Best wishes to the Doc!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Karthik Anand’s exceptional care and surgical expertise transformed my recovery from a fractured metacarpal. With his guidance, I experienced rapid healing and regained full range of motion in my hand. I highly recommend Dr. Anand to athletes seeking fast and ********* treatment for a quick return to their sport. He is a game-changer in athlete care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Karthik Anand sir is very kind *** **** ****** *** **** ******* ** ******** Before coming here I'm very much worrying of the surgery for my ACL tear.
But, he explained me very detailed of the surgery.
He just repaired my ACL tear and I'm back to my normal activities again. There is no worry for our activities post surgery.  Thank you sir

I have an pain in my right leg far longer then  I consult  Dr.Karthik Anand   he has suggest me  to do an ACL TEAR surgery then he has done in a successful way too and he has recommended  physio exercises also. Now I am feeling very relaxed because of his treatment . He is very much polite, friendly and interactive  person this gives me more confidence and his  guidance  was excellent thankful to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Hi! I visited Dr. Karthik for my grandfather’s ankle swelling and knee pain. He explained the reason for the pain and the actions to be taken to remedy the pain with so much clarity and patience. He also told us we could contact him at any time, if we had any doubts or issues regarding the medication through his personal number. Such a great experience it was.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The consultation was for my wife. Doctor explained the problem very well, made sure that we understand the issue and how is treatment going to improve the situation. No corss-selling was done. Very much satisfied with the consultation. Patient is also showing signs of recovery.

Hiiiii guys this is mahesh my right elbow got dislocated and ligament tear in a small accident I was in treatment for few months and was advised with physiotherapy, few exercise and elbow splint was also given I am now back to normal able to do all my regular job with out any surgery. I  am very much satisfied with the doctor advice nd the treatment given by him... Dr. Karthik anand was friendly nd helped me in all my tough time felling happy nd healthy now....

I visited for Back pain 
Dr. Karthik is really a  very  calm and polite doctor **** **** ********* in his profession. He explained about the cause  for my back pain and advised the do's & don't . He also taught me the exercises to be done at home . I have been following his advice for last 1month, feel much better with doing the exercises. Really recommend him for any orthopedic problems.

Hi guys, I took my amma for Shoulder Pain nd knee issue she was treated very well ,Physiotherapy was adviced now she  is feeling better.He also Communicated throw what's up in lockdown period.We are very satisfied with the treatment given.. Excellent & Friendly person.. Highly Recommend !

A Very professional and compassionate doctor . Met him for my shoulder pain and I was explained patiently by him about the cause of the pain and was very prompt when I went back with my tests . Took his time to explain the medications and strengthening exercises  as well . I would highly recommend him for any Ortho related problems .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We consulted Dr Karthik by reference from our neighbour. My mother had both knee pain for 2 years, Dr karthik saw my mom and he explained the condition and cause for knee pain. He said it was grade 2 Knee osteoarthritis and with 3 PRP injections and good physio we could stop the progression of arthritis. He also explained about the do’s and don’t which is very useful for people who are suffering from knee pain. 
We took the treatment and my mom is completely pain free now . 
Thanks you doctor, your words and explanations about the condition gives us the confidence for the treatment. 
Highly recommended for any orthopaedic problem .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had ACL tear 2 months back while playing football, I had consulted many doctors before consulting Dr Karthik in 7scope ortho clinic. I am extremely happy with Doctor for the way he had explained to me about the condition and the outcomes. The amount of confidence he gave me by saying I will be back into the field in 6-7 months of time with good rehab . Now it’s been 3 weeks since I got the Arthroscopy Acl surgery done and physio has been started. I am much happy and confident now . Thanks a lot Doctor .

The first time that I met with Dr. Karthik Anand, he was a friendly man. He described the procedure very wholly. He also answered any questions and concerns I had. He took the time to make sure all my needs were met, by explaining the type of procedure and the advantages of the system. I felt reassured going into the surgery knowing that he was very confident about the process. On the day of surgery, he came in and talked with me and had prayer with my pastor, staff and my wife. He took the time to check on me three times after surgery before I left to go home. One week after surgery, I messaged him with a concern, and he took the time out of his busy schedule to get back to me. This man is very good at what he does and cares about his patients. I have never had a doctor that would follow through as much as Dr.Karthik Anand did. I am pleased and honored to have met and had him take care of me. I will and already have to recommend the man to anyone.
Articulated issues in a manner that was easy to grasp and understand. Very Patient with each concern I had.
My mom had a fall and visited Dr. Karthik A at MGM. Doc was cool, friendly and explained issue crystal clear. Treatment suggested was reasonable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Obviously friendliness, way of explanation, down to earth nature!! Will surely recommend to all relatives and friends for sure!! Thank you so much ! Don’t change your friendliness towards your patience ever!!
reply_text: Thank you mam ! Will always be the same .

Doctor was very courteous, ************* *** explains everything patiently. Very attentive. Prompt on appointments. They treated the injury with proper sense of urgency and compassion. 100 Marks for follow-up from the doctor.  I really felt important and cared.
